turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three pizzas, small. Two of them chicken BBQ, one cheese, thin crust for all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said you wanted 3 small pizzas with thin crust, 2 chicken bbq and one cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $39, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
